document_data.name: Undead Beast
document_data.mainbody: An '''undead beast''' was a very rare type of [[undead]] that was from both [[Toril]] and [[Krynn]].
document_data.Description: Undead beasts were non-intelligent quadrupedal creatures that killed without a thought. They were about the size of small [[dragon]]s and had exposed ribcages and torn, rotting flesh. Their heads and backs had several horns protruding from them. Despite usually walking on their hands and legs, they could also rear onto their hind legs.
document_data.Combat: Undead beasts attacked with their powerful, fleshy arms and slashed with their beastly claws.
